name: Bhur
description:
Bhur (भुर्): to move rapidly or convulsively, stir, palpitate, quiver, struggle (in swimming) 

Abstract minimal electronic music miniature with generative visuals. 

This work is part of a series inspired by Indian classical music and abstract electronic music by @indianmusic

Materials created using AI-based systems, including adversarial models and large sequence models. Timbral materials are often algorithmically processed and arranged and given final form through spontaneous improvisation. 

A chance to look inwards and still the mind.
